---
title: "La page 1"
---

Ceci est la page 1.

```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

Il y aura du code et des graphes.

```{r data and plot}
tibble(x = rnorm(10), y = x + 0.5*rnorm(10), f = letters[1:10]) %>%
ggplot(aes(x, y, color = f)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  coord_equal()
```
